Inbetriebnahme einer "Griechenland Österreich.at" Aussenstelle auf Kreta
Regelmässige Hilfsmaßnamen vorort

   Für Eure Spenden senden wir euch kleine Geschenke der Dankbarkeit zu


Wo die Politik versagt, dort leiden die Menschen
Ich finde es beschämend, dass in unserer modernen Gesellschaft der Mensch so wenig zählt wie derzeit.Politiker beraten wie Banken geretten werden können und Steuern erhöht werden und Pensionen gekürzt werden sollen. In den Medien bejubelt man, wenn die Kurse der Aktien wieder steigen (daneben ein Bild mit gefüllten Sektgläsern)In einer deutschen Agenturmeldung der "Frankfuter Allgemeine" las ich folgende Mitteilung:BERLIN (dpa-AFX) - Das Deutsche Rote Kreuz
 steht für humanitäre Nothilfe in Griechenland bereit. "Das gilt für den
 Fall, dass sich die Lage vor Ort weiter verschlimmern sollte", sagte 
DRK-Sprecher Dieter Schütz der Deutschen Presse-Agentur am Mittwoch. 
Konkrete Pläne für einen Einsatz in dem von der Staatspleite bedrohten 
Land gebe es aber nicht. Allerdings habe Griechenland bereits Probleme 
bei der medizinischen Versorgung. Dies bekämen vor allem Rentner, Arme, 
Kranke und Flüchtlinge zu spüren. Befürchtet werden auch Engpässe bei 
der Grundversorgung, sollte sich die finanzielle Lage zuspitzen. Langzeitarbeitslosigkeit und Armut machen sich bereits bei den SOS 
Kinderdörfern in Griechenland bemerkbar. Zurzeit bitten fünfzigmal so 
viele Familien bei der Organisation um Hilfe wie noch vor der Krise, 
sagte der Leiter der dortigen Kinderdörfer, George Protopapas, dem 
"Redaktionsnetzwerk Deutschland". Viele Familien drohten 
auseinanderzubrechen./ggr/DP/fbr???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????Auf was warten sie? Sie haben noch keine Pläne?????In den täglichen Berichten zb.auf NTV sind immer die Banken und die Aktien im Focus, aber sogut wie nie "der Mensch", der darunter leidet was andere verbockt haben!!!!! Liebe Politiker, vergesst nie wer der Staat ist. Nicht die Banken oder die Aktien, sondern das Volk.Mein Motto ist: Geht es dem Volk gut, dann geht es dem Staat gut.
 Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann 

    Dringend benötigtes


Angesichts der zunehmend schwieriger werdenden Lage brauchen wir dringend eure Unterstützung.



    Am dringendsten gebraucht werden folgende medizinischen Hilfsmittel und Waren des täglichen Gebrauchs:


    • Windeln in allen Größen
    • Babyöl und Cremen
    • Babynahrung
    • Blutzuckerstäbchen
    • Hustensaft für Kinder
    • Fiebermesser
    • Handschuhe in allen Größen
    • OP-Masken
    • Verbandsstoffe
    • Scheren und Pinzetten
    • Schienen und Gipsverbände


    Wir freuen uns deshalb über jede Unterstützung mit Sachspenden (die auch über unsere Amazon-Wunschliste bestellt und direkt an unser Lager versendet werden können).


    Kleiderspenden können wir leider nicht berücksichtigen, da diese 
beim Transport zu viel Platz benötigen würden, den wir für 
lebenswichtige Güter benötigen. Wir bitten um Verständnis!

story:
Hello and Thank You!

Hello friends, old and new! It is with great excitement that we announce the official crowd funding campaign for the Jim Shaneberger Band’s NEW ALBUM! It has been just over two years since we released “Work In Progress”, and it has afforded us many great opportunities as a band, as well as giving us the opportunity to meet lots of amazing people. We want to pass along our heartfelt thanks to everyone who bought a copy of “Work In Progress”, pledged to the Kickstarter campaign which made it possible, has come out to our shows and has become our friends over the past few years. Without all of your support, none of this would be possible.

Rundown of The Album:

Now, onto what we are doing here. Our first album (Work In Progress) was recorded in Grand Haven, MI at Bill Chrysler's former studio, Redwall North, with our good friend Joe Sturgill engineering. It was a great experience and the album turned out great. We have decided to record the second album with the amazing Bill Chrysler himself at the brand new Bill Chrysler Studios. Bill is one of the premier sound engineers in the world and has worked with the most prominent names in the music business for decades. Some of the artists Bill has worked with over the years include: Paul McCartney, John Mayer, The Eagles, Maroon 5, Bob Seger, Christina Aguilera, John Legend, Van Morrison, Tom Petty and many more. Needless to say, Bill is incredible and very respected in the music industry and it is our pleasure to say that Bill will be co-producing the new album! The album is currently in production and we think you are going to dig it! Now that we have solidified the lineup of the band, we have been working diligently to write the album together. This album is much more band-focused and we're recording it live with minimal overdubs. It is all original music and, while staying true to our musical roots, we feel it will show a different side of the band that we are very excited about!

How You Can Help:

The reason we have put this campaign together is because we need your help! When all totaled, an album is very costly to complete. There are several things to take into consideration when budgeting to make an album, including: recording, mixing and mastering, duplication, art, promotion and more. That’s where you come in!  As you can see in the ‘Perks’ section of this campaign, the more you pledge to making the album, the better the perks will be. There is everything from a digital download of the album to a private, full band performance and everything in between. If you find yourself in position to give to this campaign, you will get some really cool stuff before anyone else and we would really appreciate it! We feel it will be something that you can be proud to help get off the ground. Let's make this album together!

If you're not in a position to give financially, we completely understand. The good news is you can still help by sharing our campaign with all of your friends and networks!

It’s finally time.

Thank you from the JSB!

story:
Short Summary

Laid To Rest
  • Song produced Nik Felippe. 
  • Song written by Nez Erok & Nik Felippe.
  • Video produced by Ross Metcalf.
  •  Directed by Nick Britton

Every five seconds a child dies of hunger around the world - so for the next 4 minutes and 30 seconds of this video, 52 children would have passed away. Imagine if these were our children? I believe that we can bring these statistics down together by realising the impact that our voices can have, united. 

My name is Nez Erok, and I am a singer/songwriter, and an advocate for women and children. Mid last year the continual attacks of the wars happening around the world baffled me. I kept asking myself that in 2014, how was this still happening? Were we just desensitised as a human race? I thought that this issue needed to be one of the most important matters for every government and every person who valued their freedom. It is heart wrenching that these people and children are being denied their basic human rights. I felt that I needed to add my voice, and that we needed everyone to add their voices so that together we could stand as one big voice!

Being a mother also, how could I only care about my own backyard and playground? Questions like, “why can’t we see beyond this”, and “what would happen if we all realised that these families in war zones were mothers that also loved their children as much as we did?” but they were victims of circumstance, and that they just didn't have the same freedoms, liberties and abilities to enact change the way that we did. These victims just do not have the ability to help themselves, and once we shake off this idea that this is just “how it is”, I believe that we can join together and actively make a difference in their lives.

The Impact

My campaign is about creating awareness around the disasters our global wars are having on our children.  This campaign is so important to me because half of the proceeds I raise will be going to charity to help with the aftermath of this conflict, and the other half raised will be going to fund my music video "Laid to Rest".

Proceeds that go to charity organisations like the ones listed below will help support and rehabilitate child victims of war. They will aid in helping victims deal with the lasting consequences of conflict on children. Charity organisations can work with local communities, their organisations and local authorities in both conflict and post-conflict areas to support children and the people they depend upon. They act in ensuring sustainable security for children, and promoting child supportive livelihood opportunities. Such organisations address the developmental needs of the most vulnerable and marginalised children. Basically, your money will go a long way!

The music video “Laid to Rest” features children living in countries suffering from unrest due to war, especially the Middle East and Africa. This concept of 'betterment for all' is a centrepiece for what this song will bring to the world. It is a video that I hope will create awareness and change. I hope that when people watch this video and hear the words of this song that they are moved enough to make a stand.  Making a difference doesn't mean that we necessarily have to travel to Africa or Afghanistan, it can be as small as signing a petition, joining a rally, or donating the amount that you would spend on a cup of coffee to an organisation that can help. I think that the saddest thing is that we all know about what is happening, but we don't realise that we can make a difference today!

What I Need & What You Get

  • I need $10,000 AUD to help me finish the music video for Laid To Rest, and also to cover costs for mastering, mixing and distribution. This will also be enough to help me finish my EP.
  • I would love to raise another $10,000 to donate to charity organisations around the world that are dedicated to helping children affected by war. Even if I cannot raise $20,000 in total, half of everything that I raise will still go to charity. 
  • You will get an array of thank you gifts, namely signed album copies, custom made t-shirts, shout outs, lunch date with me, a personalised song recording for you or your loved one, your name mentioned in the credits at the end of the video,  and so on, but most importantly you will have half of your proceeds go straight to an organisation that can save these children’s lives.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can’t contribute, it doesn’t mean that you can’t get the word out! So help me spread my message by sharing this. You can do this by using the Indiegogo share tools!
  • The magnitude of what we can achieve together is HUGE.
THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!
Links to charity organisations that I will donate to:
http://www.warchild.org.uk/
http://www.unicef.org/
http://www.savethechildren.org.au/

story:
Kimberly Otte's Band would love to go on tour! Kimberly's music of transformation and healing needs to spread out to everyone in need. Kimberly just finished her first album "Marrying Me", which represents the inner journey of transformation and healing.  The impact of her music and her life are beautifully inspiring. Let's turn her dream into reality!

Kimberly would like to raise $15,000. The money will go to traveling expenses and paying band members. Examples: plane tickets, hotels, band, food, etc….
